parameters.name: AppIds
parameters.description: IDs of all applications that are related to the lane group. Separate multiple applications with commas (,).

parameters.name: EntryApp
parameters.description: The ingress application. The application is in the EDAS:{application ID} format.

parameters.name: LogicalRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the custom namespace. The ID is in the physical region ID:custom namespace identifier format. Example: cn-hangzhou:test.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the lane group.
